PERSIONAL SUMMARY 
 Have 6 years of experience in some programming languages: C#/.Net, JAVA, C++ and 
JavaScript. 
 Have experience with some databases: Oracle, MS SqlServer, MongoDb, BTDB 
 Have experience with some modern JavaScript technologies: TypeScript, BobrilJs, 
ReactJs, Angular 2+. 
 Strong with clean code, good understanding of  SOLID and Design Patterns. 
 Good understanding with authentication, Oauth2 and IdentityServer. 
 Experienced with cloud platforms: Azure, AWS. 
 Experienced with distributed message queuing services: Kafka, AWS SQS.

Project 7 
Team size: 12

Project 6 
Company: FPT Software 
Customer: Neopost (Europe) 
Team size: 20 
Domain: Web application, windows application 
Technology: C#, BTDB, BobrilJs, EventSourcing 
Role:  Developer 
Responsibilities: Add new features, fix bug, code unit test. 
Feature: CMP is a web site allow manage and process licenses of OMS-500 
product, include features: 
 Support many licenses with difference product features 
 License can be use offline or only online 
 Support roles for salesman, technician, accountant, supporter and admin 
 License order management 
 License management 
 Customer management 
 User management 
Project 5 
Company: FPT Software 
Customer: Neopost (Europe) 
Team size: 20 
Domain: Web application, windows application 
Technology: C#, BTDB, BobrilJs, EventSourcing 
Role:  Developer 
Responsibilities: Add new features, fix bug, code unit test. 
Feature: OMS-500 is a web-based system for multichannel management of 
customer communications, includes: 
 End-to-end process management and automation 
 Supports standard input and output data formats: pdf, PCL5, TNO, 
4 
PostScript 
 Multi-lingual document management 
 Delivers info through multiple channels: web, email, printers and more 
 Supports integrity barcodes: OMR, BCR, 2D 
 Postal savings with grouping, batch printing , sorting and merging 
 Allows changes in real-time without IT involvement 
 ERP/CRM business process interfaces 
Project 4 
Company: FPT Software 
Customer: Hitachi Solution (Japan) 
Team size: 12 
Domain: Web application, windows application 
Technology: ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET API, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, SQL 
Server PL/SQL, Windows Console, WPF, SMTP Protocol, SFTP Protocol. 
Role:  Developer 
Responsibilities: Add new features, fix bug and write detail design. 
Feature: F-IMG is a web-based system use to manage documents. Feature 
includes: 
 Support multiple languages, multiple user roles 
 Manage users 
 Manage files / folders 
 Support zip / unzip documents 
 Editing images, merging images 
 Send log via email with custom template 
 Import documents from other system via SFTP protocol. 
 Backup data automatically

Company: Gameloft Hanoi Studio 
Customer: Gameloft (Europe) 
Team size: 10

Feature: Game UNO & Friends is a 3D game can play in multiple devices like: 
iOS, Android and HTML5 browsers. UNO Android game is made by porting 
from C/C++ UNO game. Game features: 
6 
 Visual 3D Android game 
 Support many languages 
 Play with machine 
 Play with social users (Facebook, Google+) 
 Play with friends by invitation 
 Play in Tournaments 
 Leaderboard / Achievement 
 CRM process 
 Notifications
